1598990.name: Atomicrops: Doom & Bloom
1598990.description:
Spring has arrived - and so has the Deervil.

This free update for Atomicrops introduces dozens of new upgrades, a new tractor and so much more.

ğŸµï¸New Location: Deervil's Den. Offers unique upgrades that grant immense power, at a huge cost.
ğŸšœNew Tractor: Motivator - Become invincible for 5 seconds. Enemies in an area drop fertilizer and seeds. Energizes all friends and turrets. Holds two charges.
ğŸŒ¹New Item - Top tier Rain Cloud Pigeon (Spring Rain): Boost and water all crops. Grow flowers. Moisten soil.
ğŸŒ·Added Flowers - Tired of weeds? Turn them in to flowers! These beautiful plants can be harvested for a profit and are brought to your farm through a number of new upgrades. To harvest, simply walk over them or use the harvest button.
ğŸŒ¼Deervil Upgrade - Crops grow 10x faster but ignite when thirsty
ğŸŒ¼Deervil Upgrade - Crops don't need water but more moles and they appear at night. Effect ends when damage is taken
ğŸŒ¼Deervil Upgrade - Infinite fertilizer but wasp pursue player, effect ends when damage taken
ğŸŒ¼Deervil Upgrade - Lose all max heart beets except one. Gain X heart beet seeds for each max heart beet lost.
ğŸŒ¼Deervil Upgrade - Tomorrow is 2x longer but a lizard will pursue you all day.
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Cows can produce milk
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Cows block bullets and drop fertilizer when bullet is blocked
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Cows move faster and hold more water
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Nasal spray - pigs can find truffles
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Pigs till Moist Soil: Crops remove moisture from soil for first watering. While soil is moist, crops grow very fast.
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Pigs move faster
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Bees turn weeds into flowers
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Chickens have 50% chance to turn weed to flower.
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Flowers on Damage taken
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Flowers on Kill
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Pigs have turrets on their backs
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Cows have turrets on their backs
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Weeds grow and spread faster
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Weeds don't grow on soil
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Flowers grow on soil instead of weeds
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Energize friends on damage
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Energize friends on scroll, tractor when energized
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Pet farm animals to energize them
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Some old weeds become flowers
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Scarecrows sometimes energize friends
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Scarecrows grow pumpkins
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Heart beets grow instantly and gain a heart beet
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Turrets and scarecrows can be deployed on hard crust
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Daily upgrade
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Always energized when at low health
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Continually energize friends when at low health
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Shoot bullet when fertilizer or seed gathered
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Mysterious flower (that resurrects player)
ğŸ’®New Upgrade - Weeds have a higher chance to drop fertilize and seeds
ğŸ’®Several New Upgrades that add 2 or 3 of specific animals, turrets, or drones
